item.title: SVO API
item.description:
The Spanish Vistual Observatory (SVO) is and astronomical archive and collaboration manage by a Spanish institution. This code is a python API to download SVO filters.

Press the tag below to see more examples

item.title: TNS API
item.description:
Transient Name Server (TNS) is the official IAU mechanism for reporting new astronomical transients such as supernova candidates. This code is a python API to easily access this archive and retrieve information.

Press the tag below to see more examples

item.title: WISeREP API
item.description:
The Weizmann Interactive Supernova Data Repository (WISeREP) serves as an archive of SN spectra and photometry, including both historical (legacy) data and data that are accumulated by ongoing modern surveys and programs. This code is a python API to easily access this archive and retrieve information.

Press the tag below to see more examples
